author: Opinion by Catarina Buchatskiy
title: Opinion: This is how Ukrainians win the long war
description: Catarina Buchatskiy, a Ukrainian student, writes about taking a leave of absence from Stanford University to fly to Poland and assist in humanitarian efforts. After Vladimir Putin invaded Ukraine, she says, "None of my life back on campus seemed to matter any…
content: Catarina Buchatskiy is a student of international relations, with a focus on security, at Stanford University. She is also the co-founder of The Shadows Project, a Ukrainian cultural organization. Th… [+5942 chars]
